subject: Soccer
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Patrick Nyarko scored in the 22nd minute to give visiting Virginia Tech a 1-0 victory over Connecticut Saturday, sending the Hokies to the N.C.A.A. College Cup semifinals for the first time.
snippet: Patrick Nyarko scored in the 22nd minute to give visiting Virginia Tech a 1-0 victory over Connecticut Saturday, sending the Hokies to the N.C.A.A. College Cup semifinals for the first time.
